about_the_game:
Hide & Seek is a fast pace, multiplayer game between police vs thieves! Plan your next heist and steal treasures from the map. Choose your role! You play as a guard or a thief.


  • As the guard, your main objective is to find and take down all the thieves before they steal all the treasures.
  • Like a thief, you have to steal all the treasures at a certain time. Be aware and don't get caught!

Play with friends or random players from all over the world! You can play on public servers or host your own.

Customize your look. Choose from dozens of different skins and play as your favorite character!

Hide & Seek is an easy play, but hard to master game that encourages strategy and skill! During each round, the locations of the treasure chests and powerful power-ups are randomly selected. Play with teammates to win and do 200 IQ moves to tip the balance of the gameplay!

Familiar rules of thieves vs cops game in a completely new form! Steal or defend treasures. Play with or against friends!
